Actions.Name: High Pressure
Actions.Effects: Can target one end of a portal. If so, the attack travels through the portal and is then retargeted to a new space or character within range 3 of the other end of the portal, as if by rebound.

Actions.Name: Whisk
Actions.Description: A foe in range becomes vulnerable, then is teleported 1. Vulnerable foes are teleported 3 instead.

Actions.Name: Aether Portal
Actions.Description: The Aerothurge chooses any two free spaces on the battlefield and links them with glowing portals.

Summons.Name: Portal
Summons.SummonEffects: Any character adjacent to a portal can spend 2 spaces of movement to teleport adjacent to the other linked portal, or vice versa.
